meta.title: ADSapp - Professional WhatsApp Business Inbox | Multi-Tenant SaaS Platform
meta.description: Transform your WhatsApp business communication with ADSapp's professional inbox. Manage conversations, automate responses, and scale your customer support with our enterprise-grade platform.

hero.description: The only professional WhatsApp Business inbox you need. Manage conversations, automate responses, and scale your customer support with enterprise-grade features designed for modern businesses.

features.title: Everything You Need to Scale Your WhatsApp Business
features.description: From startups to enterprises, ADSapp provides the tools and infrastructure to deliver exceptional customer experiences at scale.

inbox.title: Unified Team Inbox
inbox.description: Centralize all WhatsApp Business conversations in one powerful dashboard designed for team collaboration.

automation.title: Intelligent Automation
automation.description: Automate repetitive tasks with smart workflows that learn from your team's responses and improve over time.

analytics.title: Advanced Analytics
analytics.description: Gain deep insights into customer interactions, team performance, and business impact with comprehensive reporting.

security.title: Enterprise Security
security.description: Bank-grade security with end-to-end encryption, compliance certifications, and complete data sovereignty.

multiTenant.title: Multi-Tenant Architecture
multiTenant.description: Purpose-built for agencies and enterprises managing multiple brands or clients with complete data isolation.

integrations.title: Seamless Integrations
integrations.description: Connect with your existing CRM, helpdesk, and business tools for a unified customer experience.

testimonials.title: Loved by Teams Worldwide
testimonials.description: See what our customers have to say about their ADSapp experience
testimonials.quote1: ADSapp transformed our customer support. We've reduced response times by 60% and our customer satisfaction scores have never been higher.
testimonials.quote2: The automation features alone saved us 20 hours per week. Our team can now focus on complex customer issues while ADSapp handles the routine inquiries.
testimonials.quote3: Finally, a WhatsApp solution built for enterprise. The multi-tenant architecture and security features give us complete confidence.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.description: Choose the plan that fits your business size and needs. All plans include a 14-day free trial.

starter.name: Starter
starter.description: Perfect for small businesses getting started with WhatsApp Business

professional.name: Professional
professional.description: Ideal for growing businesses that need advanced features and higher limits

enterprise.name: Enterprise
enterprise.description: For large organizations requiring unlimited scale and custom solutions

pricing.trialNote: All plans include a 14-day free trial. No credit card required.

demo.title: See ADSapp in Action
demo.description: Experience the power of professional WhatsApp Business management. See how ADSapp transforms customer conversations into business growth.
demo.previewDescription: Experience the full WhatsApp Business Inbox

security.title: Enterprise-Grade Security & Compliance
security.description: Your data security is our top priority. ADSapp meets the highest industry standards.
security.encryptionDesc: End-to-end encryption for all data in transit and at rest using AES-256 standards.
security.accessControlDesc: Role-based permissions, single sign-on (SSO), and multi-factor authentication (MFA).
security.auditsDesc: Continuous security monitoring and regular third-party security assessments.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Have questions? Check out our comprehensive FAQ for answers to all your questions about ADSapp.
faq.q1: How does ADSapp integrate with WhatsApp Business?
faq.a1: ADSapp connects directly to the official WhatsApp Business Cloud API, ensuring full compliance with WhatsApp's terms of service. This provides real-time message synchronization, delivery status updates, and access to all WhatsApp Business features including rich media, templates, and interactive messages.
faq.q2: Can multiple team members manage the same WhatsApp number?
faq.a2: Yes! ADSapp is built for team collaboration. Multiple agents can simultaneously manage conversations from the same WhatsApp Business number with features like conversation assignment, internal notes, and real-time collaboration tools.
faq.q3: Is my customer data secure and private?
faq.a3: Absolutely. We implement bank-grade security with end-to-end encryption, SOC 2 Type II compliance, and GDPR compliance. Your data is stored in secure, geo-distributed data centers with regular security audits and complete data sovereignty.
faq.q4: Do you offer a free trial?
faq.a4: Yes, all plans include a 14-day free trial with full access to features. No credit card required to start, and you can cancel anytime during the trial period.
faq.q5: Can I use ADSapp for multiple businesses or clients?
faq.a5: Yes! Our multi-tenant architecture is perfect for agencies and enterprises managing multiple brands or clients. Each tenant has complete data isolation, branded interfaces, and separate billing.
faq.q6: What kind of support do you provide?
faq.a6: We offer comprehensive support including detailed documentation, video tutorials, email support, and priority support for Professional and Enterprise plans. Enterprise customers also receive a dedicated success manager.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your WhatsApp Business?
cta.description: Join thousands of businesses already using ADSapp to deliver exceptional customer experiences.
cta.trialNote: 14-day free trial • No credit card required • Setup in 5 minutes
